TextBlock.Text: DAZ: Phlox, when you have time to spare after toiling away at your statues, I would deeply appreciate if you could deliver more flat templates soon to the <color=orange>Scroll and Stone Workshop</color> upstairs!
PHLOX: I would be happy to! I always enjoy the simplicity of sculpting these templates. But did I not already deliver you several stacks recently?
DAZ: The voyager stone's development is nearing completion! I require more templates to craft and test more projection locations, before I can be confident in its use.
DAZ: You should pair with a memory statue to test the voyager stones sometime as well, Phlox!
PHLOX: Oh! I was not aware I needed to be paired to a memory statue to use them. Is there a reason for this prerequisite?
DAZ: The voyager stones are designed to work with our memory storage system for the memory statues, recording and transmitting experiences from the projection pool back to the individual.
DAZ: That is how the voyager stone allows one to explore remotely beyond a projection pool!
DAZ: Without the individual being first paired to a memory statue, I'm afraid the voyager stone would be little more than any ordinary projection stone in function.
